get.summary: Retrieve comments for a specific recipe

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the recipe to retrieve comments for

requestBody.description: Data for creating a new comment

post.summary: Add a recipe to the favourite list of the authenticated user

requestBody.description: Payload to add a recipe to favourites

description.example: This famous Argentinian chimichurri sauce is perfect for any grilled chicken, meat, or fish. My catering customers love it on garlic crostini with grilled flank steak slices.

400.description: Bad Request - Error if the recipe is already in the favourite list

error.example: You already added recipe to favourite list!

delete.summary: Remove a recipe from the favourite list of the authenticated user

204.description: Recipe removed from favourites successfully, no content to return

404.description: Not Found - Specified recipe doesn't exist in favourites

description.example: This famous Argentinian chimichurri sauce is perfect for any grilled chicken, meat, or fish. My catering customers love it on garlic crostini with grilled flank steak slices.
